posts.author: Ravingoofy
posts.content: Been trying to relearn NWN and I've been studying the builds and designs. I have noticed no one uses Lock Picking and I was wondering why?

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
I think that depends on the environment one is in.

Certainly on WoG (a PW where I play) I use Lock Picking alot.

So I am wondering in what environment you are noticing this.

Perhaps you mean lots of Ranks in LP?

That may be because there are many things that can help one pick a lock - lockpicks, spells, familiar, etc.  So having more than 1 point is often non-productive and those SPs can be better used elsewhere.

posts.author: Ravingoofy
posts.content: I was reading builds posted and none really ever have Lock Picking. Granted I finally didn't select a Spell Focus of Necro and got to experience Knock. I think I understand now why people don't. Always beneficial to have a Caster in a party.
